levelList.name: Sky-clearing Cut
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] If the main target has 5+ [Laceration], Atk Weight +1
[StartBattle] If this unit will use 4+ Attack Skills this turn, Final Power +5
[WinDuel] All allies heal 15 SP
If target has 7+ [Laceration], deal +30% damage

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง +10 [Laceration] จำนวนครั้ง

levelList.name: Rules of the Backstreets
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] Add 1 more coin per every surviving other ally (max 3)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] สร้าง 2 [Laceration] and +2 [Laceration] จำนวนครั้ง
